segments.text: To get around your difficulty , Mr Smith . I'd suggest that you reduce your order by half . You can send in an additional order later .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I'll consider the possibility . By the way , when do I have to open the L / C if I want the goods to be delivered in June .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A month before the time you want the goods to be delivered .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you possibly effect shipment more promptly ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Getting the goods ready , making out the documents and booking the shipping space , all this takes time you know . You cannot expect us to make delivery in less than a month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very well , Mr Zhang . I'll not reduce my order . I'll take the full quantity you offer . And I'll arrange for the L / C to be opened in your favor as soon as I get home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Early next month . In the meantime , I should be very pleased if you would get everything ready . I hope that the goods can be dispatched promptly after you get my L / CB
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can rest assured of that .
segments.speaker: S1
